timeline.message:
SO-4285: Add ComponentURI constructor changes

* Allow constructing ComponentURIs using CodeSystemURIs too
* Account for more than three parts present in a ComponentURI

timeline.bodyText: Rename the first argument here to codeSystemUri to indicate that it accepts an URI.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText:
It would be great to have a few parse fail tests as well to verify the following:

Number of parts >= 3 (if not fail with reasonable error message)
Last part is not empty (if not fail with reasonable error message)
Second last part is not empty and can be parsed into a short number (if not fail with reasonable error message)
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: Null to empty call is really bad here, both null and empty are invalid values for the identifier part. Don't convert it to empty here, validate instead on the other factory method.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.message: SO-4285: Rename constructor parameter to indicate it accepts a URI
SO-4285: Add further componentURI parse tests
SO-4285: Add id argument check, id argument test

SO-4285: Add ComponentURI factory method that accepts ...

... ComponentIdentifiers

timeline.bodyText: This should throw BadRequestException or IllegalArgumentException as well.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: ⚠️ The new factory methods do not use the caching mechanism built into this class!
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.message: SO-4285: Use ComponentURI cache in new constructors
SO-4285: Add more exception checks to constructor test
SO-4285: fix remaining issues with ComponentURI and ComponentURITest
